plays.text: Goal scored by Arron Asham assisted by Michael Peca and Kenny Jonsson

Goal scored by Sami Salo assisted by Markus Naslund and Todd Bertuzzi
Penalty to Oleg Kvasha 2 minutes for Hooking(opposing player not identified)
Goal scored by Alexei Yashin assisted by Claude Lapointe and Radek Martinek
